replies.body: Is it just me or are SG Lux, Lulu, Janna, & Poppy not on sale yet?

Hey - that line is supposed to read: "In addition, the following Star Guardian skins will be on 50% off sale **from February 26, 2018 at 11:00 a.m. PT** through March 5, 2018, at 11:59 PM PT", and not "from **now** through March 5, 2018, at 11:59 PM PT".

We're getting that fixed now!
Ah, ok. Thanks for replying lol. Guess I'll have to wait a bit longer.
It still isn't quite fixed: "In addition, the following Star Guardian skins will be on 50% off sale from **now** February 26, 2018 at 11:00 a.m. PT through March 5, 2018, at 11:59 PM PT."

This has now been fixed. Thanks for the catch!

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
any updates on when the battle boss skins will be on early sale? they were also slotted for february but theres been no updates on when they will be up??
The Skins are in shop now {{sticker:sona-playing}}
can you still purchase mayhem and magical mediums bundle if you already have star guardian jinx? im asking because kuro and shiro icons might not be purchasable separately, you know?

The Kuro and Shiro icons _are_ currently purchasable separately in the store, but you'll also be able to purchase the bundle if you already own Star Guardian Jinx~

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
So if you own her, will the bundle be 2 rp?
Yes the bundle will include the 2 icons for 2 RP
You can purchase the bundle and the bundle (just the 2 icons) will be 2 RP

Wait what's gonna happen to the Battle Bosses?

You said they'd also be in the February Early Sale... {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
I know right! Pentakill Kayle too!
They'll be in the early sale as well! This article was mostly to announce the 50% off sales on the first line of Star Guardian skins.

Jinx?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
SG Jinx is Legendary. Legendary don't go on sale outside the early sales.
This is early sale, shes just in a special bundle.
Jinx is going to be bundled with her icons, at 1822.
yes if you already own her then the icons will be 1 RP Each
Jinx is already in the Mayhem and Magical Mediums Bundle

Where is Pentakill Kayle!? Also the Battle Boss Skins and Thunder Lord Ornn, but specifically Pentakill Kayle? You guys said when announcing the February sales schedule last month those skins would be on sale as well (after amending the article, not to mention). I've been waiting for Pentakill Kayle!!!
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
If it's going to be announced later, then I guess that's fine, but SG skins are going to be on sale at the very end of February, so I'm afraid you guys forgot :(
They'll be in the early sale as well! This article was mostly to announce the 50% off sales on the first line of Star Guardian skins.

Hello! Saw some people asking if the Mayhem and Magical Mediums bundle would be only 2 RP if you own SG Jinx and her, and the answer to this is yes! It is indeed only 2 RP for the icons! {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
I have a question. When do the second batch of SG skins go on 50% sale? Next year?
when ll be  Star Guardian Jinx on sale?
